executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.totalMonthSalesQuotaM0: % Total Month Sales x Quota M0
executiveSummary.fatAllocatedQuotaDescription: Quota achievement relative to billed + allocated.
executiveSummary.projectedResolvedQuotaDescription: Projection of quota achievement relative to billed + allocated.
executiveSummary.totalSalesAdherentQuotaDescription: Percentage of total sales adherent to quota.
executiveSummary.totalMonthSalesQuotaM0Description: Difference of total month sales relative to quota M0.
executiveSummary.awaitingScheduleReturnDescription: Total quantity of items with 'Awaiting Schedule Return' status.
executiveSummary.fobPendingDescription: Total quantity of items with 'FOB Pending' status.
executiveSummary.creditBlockageDescription: Total quantity of items with 'Credit Blockage' status.
executiveSummary.orderBlockageDescription: Total quantity of items with 'Order Blockage' status.
executiveSummary.sellInOutTotalsDescription: Aggregated Sell-In and Sell-Out volumes across different periods.

detailedKpisTable.title: KPI Details
detailedKpisTable.chatSuggestionText: Generate a table with the Top 5 products in the "Refrigerators" category that show the largest difference between quota and billed. Use the complete data available from the source and highlight products with the largest gap between what was planned and what was sold. Include model, PNC, voltage, quota, billed, allocated, and sales shortfall.
detailedKpisTable.chatSuggestionTooltip: Click to start an interactive analysis via Chat based on the available data.

agendaFobStatus.title: Awaiting Schedule Return
agendaFobStatus.chatSuggestionText: Generate a table with the Top 5 products with the highest number of pending items in "Awaiting Schedule Return", grouped by category (Refrigerators, Washers, Stoves, Microwaves). Include model, PNC, pending quantity, and category.
agendaFobStatus.chatSuggestionTooltip: Click to start an interactive analysis via Chat based on the available data.

fobStatusTable.title: FOB Pending
fobStatusTable.chatSuggestionText: Generate a table with the Top 5 products with the highest number of pending FOB items, considering all categories. Use the complete data available from the source and include model, PNC, category, pending quantity, and voltage.
fobStatusTable.chatSuggestionTooltip: Click to start an interactive analysis via Chat based on the available data.

creditBlockTable.title: Credit Blockage
creditBlockTable.chatSuggestionText: Generate a table with the Top 5 products with the highest number of credit-blocked items. Use the complete data available from the source and present the results in descending order of blockage. Include model, PNC, pending quantity, and category.
creditBlockTable.chatSuggestionTooltip: Click to start an interactive analysis via Chat based on the available data.

orderBlockTable.title: Order Blockage
orderBlockTable.chatSuggestionText: Generate a table with the Top 5 products with the highest number of order-blocked items. Use the complete data available from the source and present the results in descending order of blockage. Include model, PNC, pending quantity, and category.
orderBlockTable.chatSuggestionTooltip: Click to start an interactive analysis via Chat based on the available data.

recommendations.title: Conclusions and Recommended Actions
recommendations.recommendationText: Quota achievement for 'Refrigerators' is below 70% after the 15th of the month. We recommend focusing on releasing credit blocks for Client C and negotiating pending schedules for high-value products.
recommendations.action1: Search for missing products for 'Refrigerator Y'.
recommendations.action2: Release credit blocks for Client C.

chatAssistant.title: Dashboard Assistant
chatAssistant.initialMessage: Hello! How can I help with your dashboard today?
chatAssistant.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question or give a command...
chatAssistant.aiResponsePrefix: I understood you said: "{{message}}". How can I adjust the dashboard based on that?
